title: OT106: Alexios I Commentos
summary:
Key ideas:
- Open thread for readers to post about anything they want
- Reminder for teams in the Adversarial Collaboration Contest to check in and submit their finished product
- Author seeks feedback on his post about Conflict vs. Mistake

Key learnings:
- None explicitly stated in the given text

Key questions:
- Are the fifteen teams in the Adversarial Collaboration Contest done, need more time, or have they given up?
- What are the criticisms of the author's post about Conflict vs. Mistake and how can it be improved?
